thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Thursday, 01 Feb 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Sichuan Huiyuan Optical Communications sees FY 2017 net profit to down

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Sichuan Huiyuan Optical Communications sees FY 2017 net profit to down

organizations.name: reuters) - sichuan huiyuan optical communications co ltd

text:
Feb 1 (Reuters) - Sichuan Huiyuan Optical Communications Co Ltd
* Says it sees net profit for FY 2017 to be 0 yuan to 3 million yuan
* Says the net profit of FY 2016 was 3 million yuan
* Comments that decreased investment income as main reason for the forecast
Source text in Chinese: goo.gl/B2e8Q5
Further company coverage: (Beijing Headline News)
